item.title: Contrition Podcast... presented by Lounge Fidelity Recordings
item.description: selected and constructed by PJ Alton www.loungefidelity.com www.soundcloud.com/loungefidelity www.myspace.com/lofirecordings www.mixcloud.com/pjAlton image by J² Designs 1. Moodymann - Yesterdays Party Watta Bout It 2. Tony Allen - Afro Disco Beat 3. Lil Louis- It's The Only Thing 4. Antibalas - War Hero 5. Lil Louis - 6 A.M. 6. Tony Allen - African Message 7. Theo Parrish - Reaction to Plastic 8. Tony Allen - Jealousy 9. Black Coffee feat. Zakes Bantwini - Juju 10. Tony Allen - Progress 11. Afefe Iku - Body Drummin' 12. Sin Palabras - Yemaya (John Beltran Remix) 13. Fela Kuti - Chop and Quench 14. Blackcoffee feat. Bucie - Turn Me On 15. Afronaut & Local 12 - Kulo

item.title: Friday The 13th Podcast... presented by Lounge Fidelity Recordings
item.description: selected and constructed by PJ Alton www.loungefidelity.com www.soundcloud.com/loungefidelity www.myspace.com/lofirecordings www.mixcloud.com/pjalton image by J² Designs Augusta Martelli & The Intercontinentals - Pais Tropical Lonnie Liston Smith - Summer Days James Brown - White Lightning (I Mean Moonshine) Gil Scott Heron - Home Is Where The Hatred Is Chaka Khan – Clouds Eddie Kendricks - Goin' Up In Smoke Velho 4 - Vibe Samba Candido - Thousand Finger Man The Four Tops - Catfish George Benson - Give Me The Night George Duke - I Want You For Myself Third World - Now That We've Found Love Seawind - Free Roy Ayers - Can't You See Me Lonnie Liston Smith - Get Down Everybody Azymuth - Jazz Carnival Unlimited Touch - Searching To Find The One Luther Vandross - Never Too Much (Album Version) Tulio De Piscopo - Stop Bajon (12-inch Version)

item.title: Life Podcast... presented by Lounge Fidelity Recordings
item.description: selected and constructed by PJ Alton www.loungefidelity.com www.soundcloud.com/loungefidelity www.myspace.com/lofirecordings www.mixcloud.com/pjalton 1. The Detroit Experiment - Too High 2. Teddy Rok 7 feat. Okou - Feel 3. Beady Belle - One And Only 4. Fertile Ground - Yellow Daisies 5. Les Gammas - Afternoon At Rossi's 6. King Britt - You Know What You Need To Do 7. Jazzanova - Soon (P Smoovah Mix) 8. Jazzanova - Takes You Back (Unexpected Dub) 9. Jazzanova - Coffee Talk 10. Clara Hill - Hard To Say (Clara Hill Meets Slope) 11. 4 Hero - Something Nothing 12. Little Dragon - Wink 13. Flying Lotus - Tea Leaf Dancers (Feat. Andreya Triana)
